fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step2.adaptableproperty.interfaces

Interface AdapterComputerI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdapterComputerConnector, AdapterComputerInboundPort, AdapterComputerOutboundPort, ComputerAdaptable

    public interface AdapterComputerI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Computer.AllocatedCore allocateCore()
      used on Computer component.
      void releaseCore(Computer.AllocatedCore ac)
      releases a priorly reserved core.
      void updateCoreFrequency(Computer.AllocatedCore allocatedCore, int frequency)
      set a new frequency for a given core on this processor; exceptions are raised if the required frequency is not admissible for this processor or not currently possible for the given core.

        used on Computer component.

      • updateCoreFrequency

        void updateCoreFrequency(Computer.AllocatedCore allocatedCore,
                         int frequency)
                  throws UnavailableFrequencyException,
                         UnacceptableFrequencyException,
                         java.lang.Exception
        set a new frequency for a given core on this processor; exceptions are raised if the required frequency is not admissible for this processor or not currently possible for the given core. used on Processor component, it requires a ProcessorManagementOutboundPort to invoke this service.
        Parameters:
        coreNo -
        frequency -
        Throws:
        UnavailableFrequencyException
        UnacceptableFrequencyException
        java.lang.Exception
